channel.title: No idea :S
channel.description:
ok so my server is completely leeched at this very moment im using creativescape as a source im currently experiancing problems in having a friend connect i wish to do so as if i cant even get past this error there is no point editing out all the bugs ironing everything out in it i am expecting many flames and rants but im not going to defend myself with words my actions shall be my defense if i can get people to be able to connect.
so i have changed my signlink added my ip in and it gets stuck saying:
no response from server please try using a different world if i use my localhost everything is fine. i can host other servers but not this one does anyone have any ideas?

then its wierd XD

whats even more weirder is i’ve some how fixed it god knows what was wrong because ive messed with so many settings now ive forgotten whats what lmfao

thanks everyone that couldnt help no idea how this issue arouse no idea how i fixed it lmfao

item.title: No idea :S
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

Dubstep:

i just looked. the server binds to port 43595. thats probably the issue. to fix it, go into server/constants.java and search “43595”. change that to “43594” and compile. then go into your client files and go into client.java. search “43595” there as well. change that to “43594” also. compile. there you go smartass ;D

oh why oh why didn’t i think of that… oh wait… i like being a smartass to people that treat me like a dumbass thank you very much for actually providing a little assistance unlike some people on my older topics of this but unfortuantly i already did that and still experiance problems all ports connecting server to client have been changed to 43594

Read full topic
